name: diffx
catch: Semantic diff tool for structured data
description: Compare JSON, YAML, TOML, XML, INI, CSV ignoring key ordering and whitespace. Shows only meaningful changes.

og.title: diffx
og.description: Semantic diff tool for structured data

features.title: 6+ File Formats
features.description: Auto-detect JSON, YAML, TOML, XML, INI, CSV or specify manually.

features.title: Recursive Directory Comparison
features.description: Compare entire directories with regex-based key filtering.

features.title: CI/CD Integration
features.description: Quiet mode and machine-readable output (JSON/YAML) for easy pipeline integration.
